title: Ticket #6323: UI survey: one check-all command, or many check-single?
description:
We should ask around (especially the facilitators) to see if something like condor_annex -check-setup makes more sense, or if would be better/easier to do something like condor_annex -check-connectivity, condor_annex -check-cloudformation, and condor_annex -check-security, or whatever, where each of the single checks might be easier to explain in the instructions.

(We could, of course, support both.)
creator: tlmiller
